attributes.action: provide legislative protection for residential boat owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Residential boat owners represent the only tenure type in the United Kingdom without legislative protection.  This leads to lack of security for a fast growing and diverse sector of the population.  Without security boat owners are subject to unfair eviction notices and uncontrolled increases in mooring fees with no power to resist it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide legislative protection for residential boat owners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15384.asp

Prime Minister's Office
